a:8:{s:5:"posts";a:388:{i:0;a:23:{s:2:"ID";s:1:"2";s:11:"post_author";s:1:"1";s:9:"post_date";s:19:"2018-01-18 07:30:03";s:13:"post_date_gmt";s:19:"2018-01-18 07:30:03";s:12:"post_content";s:970:"This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

<blockquote>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</blockquote>

...or something like this:

<blockquote>The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.</blockquote>

As a new WordPress user, you should go to <a href="https://rosalinda.axiomthemes.com/wp-admin/">your dashboard</a> to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Fusce gravida accumsan nibh. Nam est felis purus. Phasellus eu magna turpis. Donec laoreet ipsum lacinia massa euismod, a mollis nisi hendrerit. Praesent posuere ut lectus ac pulvinar. Mauris at ligula in massa aliquet bibendum at vel magna. Fusce molestie ipsum et velit venenatis, nec sodales mauris ultricies. Phasellus erat nulla, faucibus non tempus in, semper eget ligula. Vivamus eu orci justo. 

Suspendisse mollis, libero sed feugiat pulvinar, ipsum sapien rhoncus tellus, act viverra lacus magna eget erat. Quisque sit amet cursus arcu, vel eleifend lacus. Sed placerat mauris in nibh sodales, eu pulvinar neque mattis. Curabitur tempor porttitor luctus. Mauris et tristique turpis. Quisque cursus ex at lacus rutrum, in bibendum a nibh tincidunt. Vestibulum dapibus dapibus ornare. Aliquam sit amet malesuada neque. Phasellus sollicitudin consequat urna, a rhoncus augue pellentesque in. Nam aliquam justo lacus pellentesque malesuada.

hide_on_mobile="1"][trx_sc_title title_style="icon" title_align="center" link_style="default" subtitle="“It’s easy to start loving what you eat”"][vc_empty_space height="25px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_column_text]
<p style="text-align: center;">My name is Rose Spencer. I`m a life &amp; success coach, as well as a certified vegan lifestyle coach. I dedicated all my time to creating a lasting difference in the lives of other people which is why I`m committed to coaching and inspiring others, and my services are tailored to the individual needs and desires of my clients.</p>

img_size="full"][vc_empty_space height="80px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="30px" css=".vc_custom_1538486605489{margin-top: -13px !important;}"][trx_sc_title title_style="default" title_align="left" link_style="default" title="Meet Rose Spencer" subtitle="“Veganism is not a sacrifice. It is a joy.”" description="Vegetarianism may be adopted for various reasons. Many people object to eating meat out of respect for sentient life. Such ethical motivations have been codified under various religious beliefs, as well as animal rights advocacy. Other motivations for vegetarianism are health-related, political, environmental, cultural, aesthetic, economic, or personal preference.

There are variations of the diet as well: an ovo-lacto vegetarian diet includes both eggs and dairy products, an ovo-vegetarian diet includes eggs but not dairy products, and a lacto-vegetarian diet includes dairy products but not eggs. A vegan diet excludes all animal products."][trx_widget_video popup="true" cover="493" link="https://vimeo.com/90291043"][vc_empty_space height="130px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="80px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="60px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1517308997054{background-image: url(https://rosalinda.axiomthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/07_about-me_04.jpg?id=495) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="150px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="80px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="60px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile=""][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1538486810253{padding-right: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;}"]
<h3 style="text-align: center;">Imagine, in only 3 months, you will create a healthy lifestyle that honours your own health and well being.</h3>

<p style="text-align: left;">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed ac nunc elit. In vel elit eu sapien vestibulum gravida nec in augue. Phasellus eget tempor massa.</p>

link_style="default"][vc_empty_space height="60px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][trx_sc_title title_style="icon" title_align="center" link_style="default" title="Health Coaching Programs" subtitle="Transitioning to a Vegan Diet" description="Vegetarianism may be adopted for various reasons. Many people object to eating meat out of respect for sentient life. Such ethical motivations have been codified under various religious beliefs, as well as animal rights advocacy. Other motivations for vegetarianism are health-related, political, environmental, cultural, aesthetic, economic, or personal preference.</p>
<p>There are variations of the diet as well: an ovo-lacto vegetarian diet includes both eggs and dairy products, an ovo-vegetarian diet includes eggs but not dairy products, and a lacto-vegetarian diet includes dairy products but not eggs. A vegan diet excludes all animal products."][vc_empty_space height="60px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1538560763376{background-image: url(https://rosalinda.axiomthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/09_programs_02.jpg?id=445) !important;background-position: top left !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="160px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="80px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="1"][vc_empty_space height="60px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="1" hide_on_notebook="1" hide_on_tablet="1" hide_on_mobile=""][trx_sc_title title_style="default" title_tag="h3" title_align="center" link_style="default" title="Subscribe and get FREE recipes straight to your inbox"][vc_empty_space height="13px" alter_height="none" hide_on_wide="" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner scheme="default" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" icons_position="left" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-12 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12"][trx_sc_content size="none" paddings="tiny" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default"][vc_column_text]</p>

I dedicated all my time to creating a lasting difference in the lives of other people which is why I`m committed to coaching and inspiring others, and my services are tailored to the individual needs and desires of my clients.</p>

18:44:38";s:13:"post_date_gmt";s:19:"2018-01-27 18:44:38";s:12:"post_content";s:639:"Suspendisse auctor erat non posuere pellentesque. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Vestibulum rhoncus sed justo et facilisis. Ut id justo molestie, faucibus magna tempor, tempus lacus. Cum sociis natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus. Nullam lacus magna, sollicitudin nec suscipit porta, egestas non sem. Praesent iaculis ligula luctus felis finibus rutrum. Vivamus sollicitudin diam sit amet nulla fringilla luctus. Vivamus vitae hendrerit dui, ac semper sapien. <p style="text-align: center;">Do you want to be radiant and full of energy? Perhaps release some weight or feel better about the amazing body you've got? How about improving your digestion?<br />
<strong>Then you've come to the right place!</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center;">I will help you adopt a healthy and balanced plant-based diet so you can improve your energy, lose weight and feel incredible without frustration about what to eat.</p>

1. INTRODUCTION

AxiomThemes (website url address: http://axiomthemes.com/) appreciates your business and trust. We are Cyprus based company, creating products to enhance your website building experience. Please read this Privacy Policy, providing consent to both documents in order to have permission to use our services.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

2. DATA COLLECTED
DATA STORAGE LOCATION

We are Cyprus based company and operate web servers hosted in Germany. Our hosting provider Hetzner Online GmbH adheres to the EU/US “Privacy Shield”, ensuring that your data is securely stored and GDPR compliant. For more information on Hetzner Online GmbH privacy policy, please see here: Hetzner Data Privacy Policy.

REGISTRATION DATA

If you register on our website, we store your chosen username and your email address and any additional personal information added to your user profile. You can see, edit, or delete your personal information at any time (except changing your username). Website administrators can also see and edit this information.

PURCHASE DATA

To receive product support, you have to have one or more Envato/AxiomThemes purchase codes on our website. These purchase codes will be stored together with support expiration dates and your user data. This is required for us to provide you with downloads, product support and other customer services.

SUPPORT DATA

If you have registered on our website and have a valid support account, you can submit support tickets for assistance. Support form submissions are sent to our third party Ticksy ticketing system. Only the data you explicitly provided is sent, and you are asked for consent, each time you want to create a new support ticket. Ticksy adheres to the EU/US “Privacy Shield” and you can see their privacy policy here: Ticksy Privacy Policy.

COMMENTS

When you leave comments on the website we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

CONTACT FORM

Information submitted through the contact form on our site is sent to our company email, hosted by Zoho. Zoho adheres to the EU/US “Privacy Shield” policy and you can find more information about this here: Zoho Privacy Policy.

These submissions are only kept for customer service purposes they are never used for marketing purposes or shared with third parties.

GOOGLE ANALYTICS

We use Google Analytics on our site for anonymous reporting of site usage. So, no personalized data is stored. If you would like to opt-out of Google Analytics monitoring your behavior on our website please use this link: Google Analytics Opt-out.

CASES FOR USING THE PERSONAL DATA

We use your personal information in the following cases:

Verification/identification of the user during website usage;
Providing Technical Assistance;
Sending updates to our users with important information to inform about news/changes;
Checking the accounts’ activity in order to prevent fraudulent transactions and ensure the security
over our customers’ personal information;
Customize the website to make your experience more personal and engaging;
Guarantee overall performance and administrative functions run smoothly.

[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

3. EMBEDDED CONTENT

Pages on this site may include embedded content, like YouTube videos, for example. Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if you visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged-in to that website. Below you can find a list of the services we use:

FACEBOOK

The Facebook page plugin is used to display our Facebook timeline on our site. Facebook has its own cookie and privacy policies over which we have no control. There is no installation of cookies from Facebook and your IP is not sent to a Facebook server until you consent to it. See their privacy policy here: Facebook Privacy Policy .

TWITTER

We use the Twitter API to display our tweets timeline on our site. Twitter has its own cookie and privacy policies over which we have no control. Your IP is not sent to a Twitter server until you consent to it. See their privacy policy here: Twitter Privacy Policy .

YOUTUBE

We use YouTube videos embedded on our site. YouTube has its own cookie and privacy policies over which we have no control. There is no installation of cookies from YouTube and your IP is not sent to a YouTube server until you consent to it. See their privacy policy here: YouTube Privacy Policy.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

4. COOKIES

This site uses cookies – small text files that are placed on your machine to help the site provide a better user experience. In general, cookies are used to retain user preferences, store information for things like shopping carts, and provide anonymized tracking data to third party applications like Google Analytics. Cookies generally exist to make your browsing experience better. However, you may prefer to disable cookies on this site and on others. The most effective way to do this is to disable cookies in your browser. We suggest consulting the help section of your browser.

NECESSARY COOKIES (ALL SITE VISITORS)
cfduid: Is used for our CDN CloudFlare to identify individual clients behind a shared IP address and apply security settings on a per-client basis. See more information on privacy here: CloudFlare Privacy Policy.
PHPSESSID: To identify your unique session on the website.
NECESSARY COOKIES (ADDITIONAL FOR LOGGED IN CUSTOMERS)
wp-auth: Used by WordPress to authenticate logged-in visitors, password authentication and user verification.
wordpress_logged_in_{hash}: Used by WordPress to authenticate logged-in visitors, password authentication and user verification.
wordpress_test_cookie Used by WordPress to ensure cookies are working correctly.
wp-settings-[UID]: WordPress sets a few wp-settings-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.
wp-settings-[UID]:WordPress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.

[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

5. WHO HAS ACCESS TO YOUR DATA

If you are not a registered client for our site, there is no personal information we can retain or view regarding yourself.

If you are a client with a registered account, your personal information can be accessed by:

Our system administrators.
Our supporters when they (in order to provide support) need to get the information about the client accounts and access.

[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

6. THIRD PARTY ACCESS TO YOUR DATA

We don’t share your data with third-parties in a way as to reveal any of your personal information like email, name, etc. The only exceptions to that rule are for partners we have to share limited data with in order to provide the services you expect from us. Please see below:

ENVATO PTY LTD

For the purpose of validating and getting your purchase information regarding licenses for the our theme, we send your provided tokens and purchase keys to Envato Pty Ltd and use the response from their API to register your validated support data. See the Envato privacy policy here: Envato Privacy Policy.

TICKSY

Ticksy provides the support ticketing platform we use to handle support requests. The data they receive is limited to the data you explicitly provide and consent to being set when you create a support ticket. Ticksy adheres to the EU/US “Privacy Shield” and you can see their privacy policy here: Ticksy Privacy Policy.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

7. HOW LONG WE RETAIN YOUR DATA

When you submit a support ticket or a comment, its metadata is retained until (if) you tell us to remove it. We use this data so that we can recognize you and approve your comments automatically instead of holding them for moderation.

If you register on our website, we also store the personal information you provide in your user profile. You can see, edit, or delete your personal information at any time (except changing your username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

8. SECURITY MEASURES

We use the SSL/HTTPS protocol throughout our site. This encrypts our user communications with the servers so that personal identifiable information is not captured/hijacked by third parties without authorization.

In case of a data breach, system administrators will immediately take all needed steps to ensure system integrity, will contact affected users and will attempt to reset passwords if needed.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

9. YOUR DATA RIGHTS
GENERAL RIGHTS

If you have a registered account on this website or have left comments, you can request an exported file of the personal data we retain, including any additional data you have provided to us.


You can also request that we erase any of the personal data we have stored. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes. In short, we cannot erase data that is vital to you being an active customer (i.e. basic account information like an email address).

If you wish that all of your data is erased, we will no longer be able to offer any support or other product-related services to you.

GDPR RIGHTS

Your privacy is critically important to us. Going forward with the GDPR we aim to support the GDPR standard. AxiomThemes permits residents of the European Union to use its Service. Therefore, it is the intent of AxiomThemes to comply with the European General Data Protection Regulation. For more details please see here: EU GDPR Information Portal.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

10. THIRD PARTY WEBSITES

AxiomThemes may post links to third party websites on this website. These third party websites are not screened for privacy or security compliance by AxiomThemes, and you release us from any liability for the conduct of these third party websites.

All social media sharing links, either displayed as text links or social media icons do not connect you to any of the associated third parties, unless you explicitly click on them.

Please be aware that this Privacy Policy, and any other policies in place, in addition to any amendments, does not create rights enforceable by third parties or require disclosure of any personal information relating to members of the Service or Site. AxiomThemes bears no responsibility for the information collected or used by any advertiser or third party website. Please review the privacy policy and terms of service for each site you visit through third party links.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

11. RELEASE OF YOUR DATA FOR LEGAL PURPOSES

At times it may become necessary or desirable to AxiomThemes, for legal purposes, to release your information in response to a request from a government agency or a private litigant. You agree that we may disclose your information to a third party where we believe, in good faith, that it is desirable to do so for the purposes of a civil action, criminal investigation, or other legal matter. In the event that we receive a subpoena affecting your privacy, we may elect to notify you to give you an opportunity to file a motion to quash the subpoena, or we may attempt to quash it ourselves, but we are not obligated to do either. We may also proactively report you, and release your information to, third parties where we believe that it is prudent to do so for legal reasons, such as our belief that you have engaged in fraudulent activities. You release us from any damages that may arise from or relate to the release of your information to a request from law enforcement agencies or private litigants.

Any passing on of personal data for legal purposes will only be done in compliance with laws of the country you reside in.[/vc_column_text][/trx_sc_content][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space height="70px" alter_height="none" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile=""][vc_column icons_position="left"][trx_sc_content size="none" number_position="br" title_style="default" link_style="default" class="p70"][vc_column_text]

12. AMENDMENTS

We may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. <h2 style="text-align: center;">Dear Customers,</h2>
<p style="text-align: center;"><big>Our primary goal is developing a secure and customizable theme framework that meets the needs of the end user. Therefore, our customers are able to create websites using our templates as easy as 1-2-3! This process requires minimum knowledge of WordPress and coding, and extended documentation and our Support Team is always at your service. However, we ask you to keep in mind that sometimes issues occur not because of templates malfunction. There might be situations when it doesn't depend on us and the framework. For example, server settings, some extra functional that requires deep file customization, or additional plugins usage. And of course, an attempt to build a website in a very short time.</big></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><big>We know our theme framework perfectly and have a highly-professional team of developers. They will help you to develop the website you need. If you need website customization, contact our support system for further information: <a href="https://themerex.net/support/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">https://themerex.net/support/</a></big></p>

Here are some guidelines to help you write your college essay that can help you achieve the you want to achieve: show your creativity, not tell and sincerity. These tips will allow you to create a stunning essay that will be noticed by admissions officers. When you've finished the initial draft of your piece, concentrate only on the most effective parts, and move on to the next phase. You should also avoid focusing too much on the parts of your essay that did not go the way you expected. 
</p><h2>Make a college application essay.
</h2>
<p>One of the best ways to boost your chances of getting into college is to dedicate yourself to writing a college essay. This is the perfect opportunity to display your personal style as well as your interests. Admissions committees are seeking reflective, thoughtful students. They're trying to determine how you're the right choice to attend their college. There are many ideas to get you to the right place. Here are some tips that can help you write a unique college essays. 
</p><h2>Do not reveal
</h2>
<p>For college essays There are a variety of strategies you can employ the "show not reveal" method. One way to do this is to employ descriptive language to paint a picture about your subject. College essays typically range from 250-650 words, therefore, use descriptive words in a limited manner. Be careful not to use excessive adjectives and adjectives in your college essay. If your essay is too lengthy, you'll end up wasting space and not reaching your goals. 
</p><p>The purpose of a college essay is to demonstrate more than tell, so you should avoid naming every qualification and personal traits. The style of writing used in college essays speaks more about the applicant than its contents. If you are writing a personal essay, show not tell is the ideal method. This is why it's important to draft college essays confidently. These guidelines will assist you compose a top college essay. 
</p><h2>Honesty
</h2>
<p>An authentic essay needs to show that you're honest and truthful in your opinions about things. If you're certain that your opinions are heard, then lying and being honest isn't something you should avoid. In the case of writing about your parents' health, you shouldn't tell them the truth about their age rather, keep it a matter of respect in discussing the actions they took to get their well-being. Also, never lie about anything that might get you into trouble. 
</p><p>Academic integrity is crucial to your education. It's the most important factor in growing in your knowledge. Keep in mind that each person is an individual with an individual perspective. You're unlikely to find someone with the exact opinions as you do. Make sure you are as transparent as you can when discussing your thoughts with fellow students. Make sure you are honest when writing college essays. You'll be comfortable in your capacity to tell the truth and to do so in a professional manner. 
</p><h2>Creativity
</h2>
<p>In the process of applying for jobs Creative essays might not be needed, but they can be an excellent way to showcase your personality and be creative. You don't have to write about a boring subject like a hamburger perhaps even an delivery person. Make sure you include any setbacks and details about what you did to solve the issue. In the end, they'll like to <a href="https://expertpaperwriter.com/">expertpaperwriter.com/</a> know the way you used your innovative thinking. 
</p><p>An essay that is creative may require multiple drafts in order to be perfect. Don't be afraid to try different concepts. If you have a unique story, tell it. Test different ideas and determine which one works best for your personal situation. If you want to get an extra viewpoint, you can share your writing with a family member or friend who knows the topic. A second opinion can assist you in determining what's working and what isn't. 
</p><h2>Stories are better than words
</h2>
<p>Story beats in a college essay are essential to telling a story, and must be present in the writing. It doesn't matter if it's a personal story or a culture tale, stories typically have two parts starting with the end. If you are writing a story about yourself, it could be about your summer getaway or an incident from your history that has affected you. It is also possible to include lessons learned or character traits that you've developed while writing about an important incident in <a href="https://seguridadscotlandyard.com/2022/06/23/tutoriage-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly/">seguridadscotlandyard.com/2022/06/23/tutoriage-the-good-the-bad-and-the-ugly/</a> your personal experience. 
</p><p>The structure of a story usually revolves into sections, referred to as "beats." These elements of structure are employed to mark a point in the story where it changes style. Similar <a href="https://shopsneakerasylum.com/?p=10542">shopsneakerasylum.com/?p=10542</a> to a film, a novel has scenes, acts, and arcs, but they are smaller elements of the structure. Beats for stories differ from the pauses between dialogue and action. For college essays, the purpose of the story beat is to guide the reader through a story with a style that makes it simpler to follow. 
</p><h2>Using a thesaurus
</h2>
<p>One way to boost the standard of your college essays is to utilize an thesaurus. Thesaurus words can help jog your brain, however it is not recommended to use them too often. A lot of them don't have any real meaning, and may sound odd when used outside of the context of. Before making use of these words, be sure to check their online definitions. Here are some suggestions to use a thesaurus when writing your essay: 
</p><p>Utilize thesaurus to locate the proper term. It's okay to use synonyms of thesaurus in an essay. But, using too many synonyms can alter the meanings of the words. The instructor could spot this misuse of the thesaurus If you're writing to a college crowd, you don't want to lose points. Thesaurus use should be limited to a couple of words and phrases.

</p><h2>Payment methods for pay to do essay
</h2>
<p>Most pay to do essay services accept three main payment options, which include PayPal and credit cards. Automatic fraud protection protects each of the three payment options. Certain services offer additional options like instant chat with an an essayist. They also let customers select their preferred payment method and are able to accommodate customers with different payment methods. Numerous companies offering pay-to do essays offer discounts for returning clients. An order minimum of $9.95 is required for an essay. Then, the writer can work on your assignment until you approve it. 
</p><p>You should ensure that the essayist that you choose has experience in this area. Request the resume of the author to demonstrate that they have a thorough understanding of the topic. The ability to accomplish multiple targets quickly if you maintain an optimistic and goal-focused outlook. Writing can be more enjoyable when you're committed to achieving many objectives. Let's now see how you can write an essay in just 10 minutes. You will be amazed at how much you will accomplish when you are able to achieve a lot in just a few minutes. 
</p><h2>Argumentative essays are like telling an account
</h2>
<p>Writing an argumentative essay is like telling a story. It is your job to convince the readers of something, or convince them to believe some other thing. The key to being successful is to make your argument sound as natural as it can be. Here's how to do it: Consider the context in which you're writing and think about what points you would like to make. Your argument should be the final phrase. If you're not sure of where to start, just read on! 
</p><p>Argumentative essays are like stories. Your topic could be personal or controversial. That's how you make use of your personal experience to persuade other people. Even though the story may be fictional, it's essential to provide enough proof to convince the audience of the argument. The main goal of argumentative essays is to persuade that the reader to accept a particular perspective, therefore it must be interesting and engaging. 
</p><h2>Body paragraphs support your thesis claim.
</h2>
<p>The body of your essay is made up of linked concepts. These are important for your thesis. Body paragraphs allow readers to understand the evidence to support your arguments. In a body paragraph, you begin with a topic sentence that outlines the primary concept of the paragraph, and relates to your thesis assertion. Following paragraphs build on the subject sentence using well-explained evidence and <a href="https://reviewingwriting.com/review/unemployed-professors-review/">unemployedprofessor</a> describe the reasoning for your position. 
</p><p>When writing your body paragraph, think about what the point of each paragraph is. It can help support your thesis statement by providing background information particulars, opposing views as well as a detailed explanation of previous topics. The number of body paragraphs that you will use will vary on the scope of the essay. The purpose of each paragraph should be to support the thesis. 
</p><h2>Conclusion sums up your findings
</h2>
<p>The conclusion is where you recap the core theme of the paper. You also highlight the key elements that back your thesis statement. Also, it is where you draw a conclusion about the issue. Concluding means to end an article or talk. The conclusion should be concise and precise, yet not too brief. Make sure that your conclusion expresses faith in the conclusions you provided. 
</p><p>The thesis, or the main points should be provided in the concluding paragraph. Your professor will require you to do more than simply reiterating your thesis. While a conclusion is the most important part of any piece of writing, it's important to not use the same language within your body. The result is that readers will be confused and render your essay less effective. It is best to summarize your findings in a concise paragraph. 
</p><h2>The transitional words will help the reader understand your ideas
</h2>
<p>There are numerous types of transitional terms to include in your writing. They are words utilized to describe the sequence of events. Making use of transition words correctly helps your readers comprehend the relationship between your concepts. You can, for instance, use a conjunction to connect two separate clauses. It is also possible to utilize transition words to link two paragraphs within the essay. Transition words can help readers comprehend your thoughts within your essay more clearly. 
</p><p>In order to use transitional words in a proper manner You must introduce the reader with a fresh idea or piece of evidence within the paragraph following. The words that are used are usually used without adding any thoughts or ideas to the sentence. This is a huge mistake that can confuse readers. It is important to select transitional words carefully to prevent confusion. Below are a few examples. Keep in mind that transitional words can have many different forms.

</p><h2>A well-written essay is a must.
</h2>
<p>As you revise your essay, take note of the essay instructions, as they determine what kinds of resources that you could utilize. Instructions for writing essays may define the amount of words, pages, as well as headings you must use. Though you won't be able to modify these rules, it's helpful to keep track of the details. Below are some guidelines to ensure that your essay is concise and precise. These guidelines will allow you to create a compelling essay. 
</p><p>The first step is to choose a subject. It is important to choose a subject that interests you, and one that's not too controversial, and you can make a book about it. Try to choose a topic that affects the lives of the majority of people. For instance, technology is one example. In school, you should narrow the subject so that all students will be able to connect. 
</p><h2>Outlining
</h2>
<p>You must learn how to outline an essay prior to writing it. The outline should contain the most important details about the essay. The outline must be succinct but not too detailed. This requires lots of practicing. You must also follow all instructions. You must ensure that you have all the relevant information and conduct the laboratory or conduct field studies prior to writing your essay. Be sure to check the word limit and the number of sources before you begin writing. You must adhere to the style guidelines. 
</p><p>After you've identified the primary idea behind your essay, you can create an outline. An effective tool for brainstorming is to outline. Outline your essay by dividing it into paragraphs , and bracketing them with the introduction and conclusion. Making an outline will help you stay in the right direction and helps you stay organized while you write. You can refer to informative essays to learn the way they create an outline. They can help you write your essay more efficiently and prevent mistakes. 
</p><h2>Transition words
</h2>
<p>Words that transition can be utilized in writing assignments <a href="https://en.samedayessay.com/">order essay</a> to enhance the flow. These words link ideas and create connections between them. They aid your reader in understanding your point more easily. Writers can refer to a list of phrase and transition words to make their writing more intriguing. Also, substitute transition words and phrases for terms that are recurrent. They will improve the flow of an essay, as well as make it easier for students to comprehend. Transition words are used in writing essays, starting from the beginning, and asking "How does that information relate?" 
</p><p>The top transition words tie together ideas in a logical flow. These words can be utilized at the start of any paragraph or even in the middle of sentences. When used correctly they are able to connect the ideas, ensuring the reader will effortlessly shift from one thought before moving on to another. The words can also give the impression of coherence in the writing. If you don't make use of transition words, you could end up with a piece of writing that is confusing and ineffective. 
</p><h2>Citing sources
</h2>
<p>If you are writing an essay, citing sources is a vital aspect of the procedure. Citing sources is required each time you make use of someone else's words or ideas for example, in an essay or in a journal article. There are two kinds of citations available: bibliography and in-text. In-text references should contain the last name of the author as well as the page number enclosed in the parenthesis. Harvard style is commonly used for courses in the field of social sciences. The format requires author's name, page number as well as the year and year of publication. page number. 
</p><p>While common knowledge may not require a citation however, data from other sources is required. It is essential to cite sources so that readers are able to locate your writing and validate that it is authentic. Citing sources can also help readers confirm or supplement their own findings and conclusions. The paper trail provided by sources makes the reader able to verify or supplement their own work. If you intend to reference the source, keep in mind that it's not enough to simply include the author's name it is essential to include the source's in-text citation. 
</p><h2>Editing
</h2>
<p>If you're having trouble with the essay you wrote, try employing a proofreader for your essay. Such service provides you with an objective pair of eyes to ensure that your essay is flawless. It is dependent on the type of paper you're using. Professional proofreaders are aware of the particular requirements of their area. You can also give them any other requirements. WowEssays is an excellent choice if you are looking for an editor. 
</p><p>A proficient proofreader doesn't spend time resolving obvious mistakes and will instead focus on the essential properties of the essay, such as its structure, logic coherence and contextual coherence. A proofreader will recognize that the whole phrase is not coherent and must be revised. Along with identifying obvious mistakes, a good proofreader will be able determine the significance of an essay or phrase based on these properties.

These guidelines will aid you with writing your college application. Following these tips will aid you in writing an impressive essay and be recognized by admissions officers. After you finish the first draft, you should focus on the best parts of it, and move forward with the remainder of your process. Avoid focusing <a href="https://essaysrescue.com/">best essay writing service in usa</a> on parts of the paper that didn't go the way you anticipated. 
</p><h2>Make a college application essay.
</h2>
<p>One of the best methods to boost your chances of getting into college is to commit to writing a college essay. This is the perfect opportunity to display your personal style as well as your interests. Admissions committees are seeking an intelligent and thoughtful student. They're looking to understand how you're the right choice for their institution. Here's a few suggestions to help you get started. Below are some suggestions for writing your college essays that stand out. 
</p><h2>Do not reveal
</h2>
<p>There are some easy ways to apply "show not show" for writing an college essay. To paint an image about the topic One of the most effective strategies is with descriptive words. Essays for college typically span <a href="https://essaysrescue.com/masterpapers-review/">master paper review</a> from 250 to 650 words so use descriptive words sparingly. Don't use excessive adjectives and adverbs in college essays. The result is creating long essay papers and you won't achieve your objectives. 
</p><p>The goal of the college essay is to show more than simply tell. As such, you must not mention all of your qualifications and character traits. A college essay's writing style speaks more about the applicant as does its content. For a personal <a href="https://essaysrescue.com">https://essaysrescue.com</a> statement Show not Tell is the most effective method. This is the reason it is important to draft college essays confidently. By following these tips and you'll be well on your way to an impressive college application. 
</p><h2>Honesty
</h2>
<p>A good honesty essay should explain that you are honest regarding something. It is best to avoid telling untruths unless you are certain of your ability to express your opinion. If you're writing about your parents, be careful not to reveal the actual age. Try to be respectful when talking about the incident. Be sure to never make up anything that might make you a target for a lawsuit. 
</p><p>Your education is only possible by being honest to yourself. This is the primary factor to learning and progressing. Everyone is different and has their own perspective. It is unlikely that you will meet someone with the exact views as yours. Try to be as truthful as you possibly can in talking about your ideas to other colleagues. Write your college essays. You'll be comfortable in the ability of you to speak truthfully and do it correctly. 
</p><h2>Creativity
</h2>
<p>In the process of applying for jobs, creative essays may not be necessary, but they could be a fantastic method to display your uniqueness and to think out of the box. Creative essay topics are as common as a hamburger or pizza delivery men. Make sure you include any negatives as well as details of your solution. Ultimately, they will be interested in seeing how you applied your creative idea. 
</p><p>A creative essay may take several drafts to get right. Don't be afraid to try different ideas. If you have a unique story to tell, stick to the next level. Explore <a href="https://www.metooo.io/e/types-of-assignments">essaywriter review</a> different approaches and discover the one that works for your personal situation. If you're struggling, you can show your work to a trusted colleague or family member to obtain an additional view. The second view will aid you in determining what is effective and what doesn't. 
</p><h2>The Story is beaten
</h2>
<p>In college essays, story beats are essential in any narrative and must be included in the essay. Whatever the subject matter is personal or in a cultural context it is common to have two parts to a narrative that are the beginning and the end. In the case of a personal narrative, you may write about the events of your recent vacation or a past life that has influenced you. It is also possible to include characters or lessons you've learned which you've learned from creating a story about an incident in your personal daily life. 
</p><p>Sections are a type of structure that organizes a story. The sections are referred to as "beats." Each one of these elements refers to a point in the story that causes a shift in the tone. Similarly, a movie or a novel has scenes, actions as well as arcs. However, these are smaller structural elements. Stories beats are different from the pauses that occur between dialogue and action. The goal of a story beat in college essays is to help the reader follow a story. 
</p><h2>Utilizing an thesaurus
</h2>
<p>An effective way to improve the quality of your college papers is to make use of a thesaurus. Although thesaurus words may help to refresh your memory, you should not overuse them. A majority of the words do not come from a natural context and can appear odd when they are used in a non-native context. Before with these terms, be sure to check their online definitions. Here are some suggestions to use a thesaurus when writing your paper: 
</p><p>If you use thesaurus, make certain to select the correct word. While it's okay to use thesaurus-related synonyms in your essays but it's important to remember that too many can change the meanings of the words. Your instructor may detect this use of thesaurus in a way If you're writing for a college audience You don't want to lose points. Thesaurus usage should be limited to a couple of words and phrases.

</p><p>After having gathered the ideas, brainstorming could be an ideal way to come up with new ideas. </p><h2>Ideas for organizing
</h2>
<p>A thesis statement is the very first essential step in arranging the essay. It could be already written as the central argument for your essay. It must be a succinct paragraph that clearly explains your primary point. The thesis statements that are strong will help organize essays and help readers understand what you are saying. If you are writing your essay in the final form your essay, you'll remove this thesis assertion. If you're uncomfortable with this task, draft it in any way you like. 
</p><p>The use of transitions is to connect ideas within paragraphs. These words are used to connect ideas and enable the reader to follow the concepts throughout your essay. Sometimes it can be difficult to link paragraphs due to the manner in which they are organized. But, the words used to transition allow you to connect concepts making your essay simpler to read. Here's some ideas on how to use transition words. Once you've finished writing your thesis statement you can arrange your thoughts before moving towards the next phase of your paper. 
</p><p>An essay's organization is just as important as its content. Without an identifiable organizational pattern it is possible that readers will be confused by the information. The structure of your organization allows readers to link body paragraphs with your thesis assertion. In addition, it keeps the reader focused on your subject and ensures that each paragraph is in line with your argument. If you decide to use an organizational arrangement, you'll get an essay that is more appealing and will get read by more readers. 
</p><p>The organization is the primary part of creating an essay. Think about the information you'll be including in every paragraph and how you'll arrange your thoughts. Although you can put them in any order you like, there are better choices for specific topics. Once you've settled on the order in which you want your paragraphs to be writtenin, it's time for you to decide what structure to put in your ideas. This is your choice, but it will help readers to comprehend your perspective more effectively.

</p><h2>What is the best way to select a thesis sentence
</h2>
<p>When writing an article, it is essential that you pick an argumentative thesis. It is the primary orientation of the essay. It should be brief and concise - one sentence or two, as needed it should summarise what is the principal idea behind the paper. It should not exceed two-three sentences in the event that the essay is very long. The thesis could be more than one sentence, based upon how lengthy and complicated the work is. The thesis statement must not exceed two lines , or between thirty and forty words long. It must be included right at the beginning of your paper. However, teachers may have different preferences. It may be preferred by teachers to include it within the last couple of sentences or even three. 
</p><p>The thesis statement should be clearly stated and can back up with factual evidence and facts. The thesis statement should not be only an opinion. The thesis should be in a position to argue and even challenge any other. Be careful not to make your thesis too general, as this could result in weak arguments. Choose a specific thesis as well as one that is relevant. Additionally, be sure your thesis statement is contestable. It's possible to modify your thesis statement in the event that you don't have proof to back it. 
</p><h2>Picking out a topic
</h2>
<p>Writing an essay calls for the pupil to choose a topic. It is important to pick a topic that is not too broad or narrow. </p><p>The ideal topics to write about should be ones with many sources and trustworthy sources. If you choose a narrow subject, it will cause a lack of relevant information to write your essay. Additionally that the topic is too narrow can result in a failure to identify reliable sources that you can discuss. 
</p><h2>Making a decision
</h2>
<p>An effective conclusion is a crucial aspect of making a strong essay. Your essay must flow seamlessly. But, it is important to ensure that your conclusion stands out. </p><p>Your final paragraph must convey your sense of closure for the reader. The conclusion should inform readers that questions were asked or possibilities opened. The argument that you are presenting should be contained in the body of the article. 
</p><p>In your conclusion, summarize all the key points. You want to convince the reader they have succeeded in arguing on or against a certain subject. You should examine the topics paragraphs in order to accomplish this. You should ensure that every subject sentence includes the essential points. In your conclusion, but don't make the same argument or proof. 
</p><h2>Reviewing the plagiarism
</h2>
<p>When writing an essay, check for plagiarism by reading the essay and looking for indications that suggest that it is a copycat. One of the most prevalent ways of plagiarizing your work is to make use of phrases and concepts of other writers without properly citing sources. Sometimes students will stray off topic or cite bad sources, but they fail to include endnotes or footnotes. This is an infringement on the rights of the creator and should be absconding with. Also, student's writings may include ambiguous phrasing due to inadequate translations. 
</p><p>A plagiarism checker can also be utilized to spot plagiarism in documents. It is possible to use an online program like BibMe Plus to look for plagiarism. It will also help you avoid the most common errors. These tools are efficient and quick, and will not alter the format of your paper. These tools can be used for editing. They will enable you to swiftly check for plagiarism in your essay and ensure that it looks perfect. 
</p><p>Tools for checking plagiarism online are completely free however they can be tedious and lengthy. It's worth it to avoid the possibility of plagiarism. The Internet is getting more and more popular, so there's always a risk of plagiarising. You can search for almost everything on the internet, which makes harder to prove creative. This isn't the only reason it's crucial to verify plagiarism, but you can avoid a lot of hassle in the future. 
</p><h2>You should choose a business that can provide an ability to detect plagiarism
</h2>

</p><p>Most teachers use some form of plagiarism checking tool to make certain that students are submitting original work. Some teachers use the Google search tool to test for plagiarism. </p><p>Contrary to Google and other plagiarism-checkers, the one offered by Turnitin features an advanced , artificial intelligence-powered writing tool that can detect if your work is plagiarized and warn you about any mistakes.
